info.name: Pinboard - skin in blue
info.description: ETA 7 February 2014: Just a couple of small tweaks. This is the same layout as style 54881 but with a different colour scheme - instead of tan & brown it's blue. (It's also available in green, purple, and red.)
info.additionalInfo:
Colour codes:
#020c47 - main text & links & top banner background
#eceef7 - background & banner links & bookmark tags hover
#dddfe8 - background private bookmark & background bookmark tags & non-selected star
#6b7198 - bookmark links already saved & assorted borders & text
#3441bf - visited bookmark links
#010f74 - bookmark links
#71027b - link hover & & code & blockquote & assorted selections
#e6dde8 - background unread bookmark link & background selected tag in sidebar & background help & background bookmarklet
